channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- Andover Continuum models 9680, 5740 and 5720, bCX4040, bCX9640, 9900, 9940, 9924 and 9702
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- Andover Continuum models 9680, 5740 and 5720, bCX4040, bCX9640, 9900, 9940, 9924 and 9702

item.title: CVE-2019-6853|2024-08-04T20:31:04.456Z -- schneider%20electric -- andover%20continuum%20models%209680%2C%205740%20and%205720%2C%20bcx4040%2C%20bcx9640%2C%209900%2C%209940%2C%209924%20and%209702
item.description: A CWE-79: Failure to Preserve Web Page Structure vulnerability exists in Andover Continuum (models 9680, 5740 and 5720, bCX4040, bCX9640, 9900, 9940, 9924 and 9702) , which could enable a successful Cross-site Scripting (XSS attack) when using the products web server.
